initial_state: User is on the Account settings page and has a valid current password.
steps: Wait for the modal to appear for email editing.
Enter the desired new email address in the appropriate text input field.
Enter the current password in the password input field.
Optionally toggle the password visibility if needed.
expected_state: The email address is updated to the new email provided, and the user remains on the Account settings page with their changes successfully saved.
